Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2016 10:40AM lgreene33 wrote: Just diagnosed and think still in shock. IDC/3 small DCIS 1.6 cm Left Breast. ER+/PR+. HER2 negative. Stage 1 at this point. Grade 3. Treating with MD Anderson which is helping calm my nerves. Segmental mastectomy/reconstruction 11/16/16. So far scans are all negative for nodes but know true definitive answer will be post op. Praying hard they stay clear. Praying hard for low oncotype score so do not want Chemo. Radiation will follow 5 days per week for 5 weeks. Feeling scared and blessed 3 D Mammogram caught it.
Posts.Title: October 2016 Surgeries javamama yogadedra
